text:
FullStack 360 | New York, NY | www.fullstack360.com | Part-Time | Onsite

FS360 is a new coding bootcamp (six months old) based in NYC that focuses on Node JS, React and iOS. We offer part time evening courses as well as a 24-week evening bootcamp designed for working professionals. We are currently looking for instructors in all areas as well as Python. We are also looking for interns to help out at teaching instructors.

If you are based in NYC and want to earn extra money in addition to your work as a software developer, contact us at:

dan@fullstack360.com
